title: Convictions and acts prior to January 1, 2002
context: ยง291E-4 Convictions and acts prior to January 1, 2002. (a) Any: (1) Conviction for an offense under section 200-81, 291-4, 291-4.4, or 291-7 as those sections were in effect on December 31, 2001; (2) Conviction in any other state or federal jurisdiction for an offense that is comparable to operating or being in physical control of a vehicle while having either an unlawful alcohol concentration or an unlawful drug content in the blood or urine or while under the influence of an intoxicant; or (3) Adjudication of a minor for a law violation that, if committed by an adult, would constitute a violation of section 200-81, 291-4, 291-4.4, 291-4.5, or 291-7 as those sections were in effect on December 31, 2001; shall be counted as a prior offense for purposes of section 291E-41, 291E-61, or 291E-61.5. (b) Any conviction of an offense under section 291-4, 291-4.4, 291-4.5, or 291-7 as those sections were in effect on December 31, 2001, shall be counted for purposes of imposing sentence for a violation under section 291E-62. [L 2000, c 189, pt of ยง23; am L 2003, c 71, ยง2; am L 2004, c 90, ยง4]
